Description: Amulet of a ram. An amulet of a ram in relief walking to the right. The head and front area of the body are in opaque dark-violet glass, the remainder of the body being of opaque white glass, matt surface. Flat and plain reverse.
Curator's comments: Andrews, 'Amulets of Ancient Egypt' (1994): fig.66 A. Nesbitt, 'Catalogue of the Collection of Glass formed by Felix Slade' (1871), no. 1, illustrated.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.38, pp.36-37)
